info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 4:48PM MST until February 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
